attributes.action: Spend road tax income on the roads themselves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The roads are in a dreadful condition where I live, huge pot-holes every where. The council seem to spend all their money erecting silly flashing speed limit signs instead of addressing the dangerous condition of the road surface itself.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
